Name: WINDOW
Description: You look out the window. It's dark, so you can't see much, but looking makes you feel uneasy.

Name: BED
Description: The blankets are a messy heap.

Name: NIGHTSTAND
Description: It's a very old mahogany nightstand. The top drawer is ajar.

Name: HOUSEPLANT
Description: The leaves are beginning to yellow and wilt. Drat. You overwatered this one.
